data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grossi, Paschoal Coelho, Abadie, Esteban Ignácio (2008): A new species of Eremobothynus Ohaus (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Dynastinae) from Argentina, with notes on Eremobothynus cornutus (Steinheil). Zootaxa 1733: 57-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181374
